org.opentrafficsim.core.value.vfloat.vector

Class FloatVector<U extends Unit<U>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opentrafficsim.core.value.AbstractValue<U>
      • org.opentrafficsim.core.value.vfloat.vector.FloatVector<U>
  • Type Parameters:
    U - The unit for this FloatVector
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Value<U>, ReadOnlyFloatVectorFunctions<U>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FloatVector.Abs, FloatVector.Rel, MutableFloatVector

    public abstract class FloatVector<U extends Unit<U>>
extends AbstractValue<U>
implements Serializable, ReadOnlyFloatVectorFunctions<U>
    Immutable float vector.

    Copyright (c) 2014 Delft University of Technology, PO Box 5, 2600 AA, Delft, the Netherlands. All rights reserved.
    BSD-style license. See OpenTrafficSim License.

    Version:
    Jun 13, 2014
    Author:
    Alexander Verbraeck, Peter Knoppers
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getVectorSI

        protected final FloatMatrix1D getVectorSI()
        Returns:

      • deepCopyData

        protected final void deepCopyData()
        Make a deep copy of the data (used ONLY in the MutableDoubleVector sub class).

      • mutable

        public abstract MutableFloatVector<U> mutable()
        Create a mutable version of this FloatVector.
        The mutable version is created with a shallow copy of the data and the internal copyOnWrite flag set. The first operation in the mutable version that modifies the data shall trigger a deep copy of the data.
        Returns:
        MutableFloatVector; mutable version of this FloatVector

      • initialize

        protected final void initialize(float[] values)
        Import the values and convert them into SI units.
        Parameters:
        values - float[]; an array of values

      • initialize

        protected final void initialize(FloatMatrix1D values)
        Import the values from an existing FloatMatrix1D. This makes a shallow copy.
        Parameters:
        values - FloatMatrix1D; the values

      • initialize

        protected final void initialize(FloatScalar<U>[] values)
                         throws ValueException
        Construct the vector and store the values in SI units.
        Parameters:
        values - an array of values for the constructor
        Throws:
        ValueException - exception thrown when array with zero elements is offered

      • createMatrix1D

        protected abstract FloatMatrix1D createMatrix1D(int size)
        This method has to be implemented by each leaf class.
        Parameters:
        size - the number of cells in the vector
        Returns:
        an instance of the right type of matrix (absolute / relative, dense / sparse, etc.).

                  throws ValueException
        Specified by:
        getSI in interface ReadOnlyFloatVectorFunctions<U extends Unit<U>>

        Throws:
